website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, lightweight, vibrating seat with a few design flaws.
cons: Some say the vibrations are weak
Others complain about usefulness of mirror attachment

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel seat
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy seat is amazing for the price (especially when it's $17!). It's perfect for travel, fits easily in any suitcase. We initially bought it for travel, but I love it even more than our bulky swing / rocker seat we have at home. My baby doesn't nap super easily, and he napped SO well in this thing. I wish we had discovered it sooner - it could have replaced quite a few(more expensive) baby gadgets. My husband said some reviewers noted that it tips easily... and while it can tip easily while empty, the weight of the baby makes it nearly impossible to tip... so not a worry you should have.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, just a few things. The"mirror" is more of a reflective sticker, baby sill loves it but don't expect a mirror. Baby kicks the bars that support it at the feet. There's no padding so when he kicks it he kicks the metal. It's not terrible but I'll probably stuff something under there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incline too Steep, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Okay product. The incline is a little too steep for a newborn that is lacking in head control. The steep incline causes newborn heads to flop slightly forward, which can cause airway occlusion. As the baby grows and gains better head control they do enjoy sitting in this bouncer, and playing with the toys on the bar. The toys are double sided, sturdy, and spin around. The colors on the seat are bring and stimulating, and the vibrating feature is handy to sooth gassy babies. Assembly is easy and takes about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must-have
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a bouncer but my sister has one and it has been very useful for her babies. I initially purchased a much more expensive version because, frankly, I think this one is ugly. However, in the interest of supporting my more penny-pinching husband, I bought this one. Easy to assemble and best of all - my three month old baby loved it instantly. You should probably also know that I don't believe in toys, so this purchase was one of very few. BUY THIS ONE! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kjirsten E

customer_reviews.title: Let me tell you how much my kid liked this thing
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you how much my kid liked this thing. He liked to bounce. He liked to hit the little tiger in the center. He liked to drink his bottle in it. Liked to take a nap. He even had a back-up one at the babysitters house, so I've bought this thing twice. When the babysitter needed one, I bought a different brand/type (rocker style) and he was like "yeah, no, can I have the same bouncer?" So I bought a second one and we used this until about 5 months when his 99 percentile fat booty started making it sag and we had to give it to another baby.
customer_reviews.author: J Solognier

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great value, ugly colors
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it and keep as an easy seat in kitchen for baby when mama needs to cook or do dishes. Bad news is attracts toddlers due to bounce. I caught my 2 year old try to sit and bounce on the infant so need to watch baby like a hawk in this. Also little to no head support in this so not for falling asleep. I put an old high chair head support on mine with the straps through it and helped support wobbly infant head loads. The whole cloth part comes off completely and can be washed and dried in event of a blowout.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bouncer... spend more for better quality
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer was not a good buy at all.. I ordered it for the cheap price... the stitching is way off so babys head always falls to the side. It is also super stiff so baby's head is constantly resting on hard metal piece.. I ordered this month's in advance so I couldn't return it. I used when my 9.5 Ibs newborn was born and now he is a 15Ibs 3 month old and it is still terrible even though he's bigger. I also ordered another to see if I just got 1 bad one, but no it was just as bad...I was able to return the second one. I would recommend buying a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to clean and reassemble, toys are blah
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, my 3 month old likes to sit in his bouncer for up to 15-20 minutes at a time. The cushion is super easy to take off and put back on, we’ve had two poop explosions on it so far and after washing and drying it, there are no stains and it goes back on in less than a minute. The only thing I don’t care for is that the toys are really too short and boring to catch his attention at this age. I have another hanging toy clipped onto the bar that he can see up close and grab at and he’s much happier now.
customer_reviews.author: kristyn

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cheap- I thought the toy attachments were cheap and useless. My baby LOVES this stupid thing. It is the most used baby item I bought- we got a Mamaroo Rocker as well, used that for the first month and then it became a $200 brick in my nursery. This bouncer thing though, six months going strong and the baby loves slapping the toys. It’s light and portable, making it easy to plop baby down wherever you happen to be.
customer_reviews.author: CookieJess

customer_reviews.title: If you use this with a younger baby...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bouncer that does what it is supposed to do. It is bright and light in weight which is fantastic. IF YOU HAVE AN INFANT/YOUNG BABY: Please be super careful. This bouncer requires your baby to have some good weight to help the back of the bouncer sit low enough to be comfortable to baby. I found that my baby's head was slumping too far forward while he was an infant. Also, my son is now 4 months and the toys are a bit hard for him to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Psmith

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well priced and a life-saver for new moms who want to put their baby down and get a shower, the Bright Starts Playful Pinwheels Bouncer is cute, functional and great for babies who are not yet highly-mobile. The buzzing seat soothes and the bouncing action moves the visuals to keep baby entertained. This product was a Godsend when I had my daughter and although it wasn't on my friend's baby registry, I bought it and gave it as a gift. To me, it's an essential that should not be missed! I highly recommend it for a gift or to buy for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave your child asleep in it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old Loves it!! It’s easy to assemble, very light weight and the vibrating feature soothes and calms baby. I do NOT recommend for baby’s to sleep in it, once asleep their head hangs down, off to the side and leaves the baby at risk for blocking his/her airway. So please be sure to use only while baby is awake and active. But great product any baby will love!
customer_reviews.author: Christina O.

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third child. We have had several different bouncers and this is by far the worst. The vibration is awful. Not soothing for my baby at all. The toy bar does not stay on well. If you accidentally bump it, it pops off. The grips do not stay in one spot. They slide on the bar and slip over, not doing their job. The fabric is nice but there is no infant insert for newborns. Overall, I would recommend getting a different bouncer. The one plus is it is very easy to remove the cover to wash as they are only clips.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasaurusx3

customer_reviews.title: Great for fussy baby!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a two month old who won’t let us sit her down. Turns out she really likes it and it can usually hold her attention for about 30-45 minutes before she gets fussy. She is almost 5 months now and we still use it daily, usually to put her in while I shower and get ready. I wish I would have bought this to use when she was first brought home from hospital, it would have saved us many tears.
customer_reviews.author: Cakawa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought it because they had something similar at daycare and our 2 months old daughter loved it. It's really easy to move around the house and the baby likes to sit in it and take naps. She can't hold her head very well yet so we always watch her and sometimes put a little "pillow" from a burp cloth so her head is more straight when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Lee W

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair but vibration is not the strongest
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super convenient. We use it all the time and my sons seems to love it. However, the vibration is not the strongest. We previously had a baby einstein one that broke, and we called it his "poop chair" because the vibration alway seemed to get things moving. We ordered this as a replacement and it doesn't seem to have the same effect, however- I'm sure not everyone is looking for that! The one problem we do have is the "vibration box" just slides into the front part of the chair, and occasionally dislodges and falls out. I feel like it should be in more securely. But overall, this is a good chair and he does enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA K GREENE

customer_reviews.title: Toy bar lifts right out
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for just a seat and do not plan to use the toy bar, this is perfect. It is inexpensive, cute, and comfortable. Has vibration feature, which is nice for baby. But if you plan to use the toy bar, stay away from this product. The toy bar for it does not click into place. It just sits in the holes. This means that it is easily bumped out of place and can hit the baby in the face.
customer_reviews.author: PhDmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, need to secure toy bar
customer_reviews.text: Cute seat, great for the price. Wish the toy bar would secure better or that there would be a handle on the back. When I am holding the baby and need to move the seat to a better location before putting him in it, it’s awkward trying to pick it up. Ideally I’d be able to grab the toy bar but this one doesn’t clip in or anything secure, so it comes right out. A bit of a help and a hindrance I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: GiulianasMama

customer_reviews.title: Need extra work for NB
customer_reviews.text: In general, this is a great product, just that I got it for NB, and for them its more of manual work for parents/caretakers. My daughter enjoys it a lot, but someone needs to continuously rock it as the vibration part doesn't help much. When my baby sleeps in this her neck fall on the side, I think its more suited for 4-5+ months old, where they can bounce is themself If it would have come with infant padding that would have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the fancy and expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my. Old bouncer when I was moving so with this being my third and last baby I didn't want to buy an expensive one. And well this one is affordable and works just as well! My baby loves sitting and sleeping in this. It vibrates so that helps my child fall asleep. The only down size of this is that the spinning mirror And toys don't click in they just sit into the hole, so it tends to fall out easy and when baby kicks it near it it comes off. Other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this bouncer! It was easy to put together, even for someone like me who struggles to put stuff together! The material is super soft and sturdy and has held up very well! It's very easy to remove and stick in the washing machine! I love that the toy part is removable for easy access to put baby in/take baby out without hassle. I'll definitely be recommending to my expecting friends!
customer_reviews.author: Macy Tregellas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old and I both love her lion chair. The toy bar is easy to get on and off. I live putting my daughter in her chair while I cook and bake so I can still see her and talk to her, but she's safely away from the action. With the vibration on and a full tummy, she will often drift off for nap time.
customer_reviews.author: Smithie13

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 baby gear purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is awesome! We’ve been using since 3 months, baby is 5 months now and will probably continue to use for a while. Definitely great value, light-weight and very portable- we’ve taken it on all our overnight car trips. Only drawback is the bar is too high for my daughter to reach, and the toys on it aren’t that interesting anyway. We bought some other hanging toys and clipped them on there. The battery lasts a long time on the vibration setting... I just can never remember to turn it off when I get the baby out.
customer_reviews.author: LauraS

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. There are some strings loose so I do worry about how long it'll last. Aesthetically it's cute but I wish the warning label weren't on the front right by the head. Even if it needed to be on the front to ensure it's seen then it could have been placed where the baby seats so when it's in use if you want a video or picture of baby in the bouncer you dont have the warning label right next to their head...
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern but the overall design of bouncer is a little clumsy, the red feet on the base never stay in place and the toy bar does not click in, its freely standing so it will just fall out if you hit it. It’s also more expensive then other bouncers, I paid a little extra for the design. While it of course gets the job done I’d recommend another bouncer for a better price and overall construction.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Matson

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandbaby
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the one I had for my kids back in the old days, but the same basic design. Baby loves it and is secure in it. The toy bar can be left on or off and is easy to maneuver. Nice alternative for when baby is tired of being in a full upright sitter. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ohjeezleweez

customer_reviews.title: Simple, does the job
customer_reviews.text: The colors are cute. The toys are pretty basic so we may add something more interesting. The toy bar easily detaches - maybe a little too easily, it can't lock down at all so the "big kids" constantly pull it off. It does vibrate and was easy to assemble. The frame is cheap-feeling, plastic-wrapped wire so I'm not sure how long it will truly last. This is our 4th baby so we've seen some bouncers. However, this one is able to hold my 30lb 2-year-old without issue, so that's a plus. For the price, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LoganMama

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fun chair
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this. Easy to assemble and vibration seems like it's going to be weak But actually does vibrate through the whole seat. The construction of the frame allows you to bounce too. Really nice to bounce with your feet when your hands are otherwise occupied. The overhead toys are cute for them to swat at. Mirror is not real mirror, just reflection shiny film. Seatbelt is nice and wide for bigger babies and for them to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality, GREAT value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because our current bouncer stopped vibrating. You can’t beat this thing for the price. Don’t waste your money on those stupid Mommaroos - this $17 bouncer is where it’s at (and this is baby three, so I’ve tried a lot of baby junk). Lightweight, high waist buckle, super simple to assemble and did-assemble when someone pukes all through it. I’d buy this again. And again. And again. But I don’t think I’ll need to since it seems to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps our daughter occupied when we have to do stuff around the house. She’s been using it for MONTHS now & actually prefers this over swings she’s gotten. When it gets dirty it’s easy to just take the cushion off & toss it in with the rest of her laundry. Very easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, I don't use the bar with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, I don't use the bar with the spinner toys or the vibrating device, but just as a seat I can rest my infant in while outside in the shade, its perfect. The straps are easy to clip and unclip. It has held up through a lot so far (3 months use with toddlers jumping on it also, left on porch overnight a few times, spit up in, etc), and the fabric still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine with a c

customer_reviews.title: Pinwheel Bouncer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grand baby. 1st of all the previous reviews were spot on. I am in the middle of 1/2 hip surgeries and going to the box stores isn't easy. Amazon with the great pictures and review for this product made the purchase very easy. What was super easy was my daughter had this bouncer assembled within 10 minutes. Very easy to maneuver around and the attachments are a hit for grand baby and the cats to. They have been using this for a month now and no issues to report. Two thumbs up for a growing infant who likes to kick and reach for the pin wheel attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Seat is too deep. Vibration is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: I have twin newborns so I purchased this and another bouncer to compare. I love the colors and the design, but the vibration is not as strong as the other one, and the seat is very deep so the baby folds the neck down and it makes me nervous that he is not breathing well in there. Will keep it because I am hoping it will fit better once he is a little bigger, but I wish the seat was in an upright position instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in original box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off a baby gift registry and just received it today. I have no idea what the product will be like but it was shipped in the original box which arrived smashed on one end and covered in dirt. I gave it 2 stars because I'm going to be very embarrassed giving this package at a baby shower on Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Well made inexpensive baby chair
customer_reviews.text: We were given a baby bjorn which is 180$, but i prefer this cute chair. They both function the exact same way (a chair for a baby) only this one is lighter and easier to bring around the house to different rooms. The fun lion fabric is loved by all the toddlers that visit us too. They all crawl in and sit on the chair so i know it will be able to be used by our daughter for the next couple of years. Amazing value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RG1067

customer_reviews.title: More inclined than reclined
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old... she likes it okay but I have to prop her head up when she sleeps because of how inclined it is. I wish it was a little more reclined but I’m sure when she is a little older it won’t be as bad. Definitely recommend this for about 4-5 months plus. Not really the greatest option but it works for what we needed and hoping she will be more comfortable as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Whitneyhyde91

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value! I bought this as a cheap option to have at our 4 month old daughters caregivers house. She has a more expensive one and prefers this one over it. I actually ended up buying another one to have at home. I'm not a big fan of the mirror, as it sits at a weird angle where she can't really see anything besides what is behind her. We actually hang toys off of the bar that she can play with. The material is soft and it seems very sturdy and safe. Super easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight bouncer that can be used for travel
customer_reviews.text: Despite having a bouncer and a mamaroo already I purchased this for my 2.5 month old to use on vacation. I wanted something that could be easily packed in our suitcase, was light weight and could be reassembled with out special tools. Thanks to Amazon reviews I discovered this bouncer and I'm really glad I did. My daughter absolutely loved it and it met all the criteria of what I was looking for. In fact she liked it so much as soon as we got home I set it up in our house because she prefers this over her other bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily and Nick

customer_reviews.title: WELL worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had countless hours of fun and use in this seat. We keep it in the kitchen with us while we work and our son also sits in it while we eat dinner, since he can't sit upright in a high chair yet. He loves the toys and we've added to it at times. Assembly was so easy and fast and it's super easy to take the cover off to wash in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Solberg

customer_reviews.title: the most important piece of gear you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this thing saved our life. It was probably the only baby gear bub loved (of course not the expensive swings or rockers) ours now looks battle worn as it has seen us through a year of blow outs, teething and general destruction. We will for sure purchase another for our second as big brother still uses his like a toddler chair and has gotten more use then we could have imagined out of it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great place to park a baby who has a little neck control for a few minutes. More than that my son would start to slouch (even with seatbelt on). He’s started batting at the toys recently so we are pleased it’s growing with him!
customer_reviews.author: FcommaQ

customer_reviews.title: Only okay
customer_reviews.text: Meh is really all I can say. It’s okay, not great, not terrible. I have the competitor to it already and got this for another room. I can say the competitor version is longer, deeper and wider and less high and feels safer
customer_reviews.author: StaceyNO

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Supper adorable 😍 perfect to keep the little one in while your trying to get stuff done around the house . Love that it vibrates too
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is hard on babies legs and needs extra padding.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bouncer, especially for the price. The only reason I didn't give it five stars was because the bottom is rather hard and my son was starting to get bruises from kicking his legs against the metal bottom. We solved the issue by padding the bottom of the inside with baby washcloths and it has been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Every parent needs one!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bouncer! It was given to us as a gift. And it has quickly become our baby essential. Our daughter loves it so much. We ended up buying another one to keep upstairs. This bouncer keeps our daughter happy and allows us to do things. We highly recommend this bouncer over the Mamaroo. The vibration on the bouncer works so much better than any option on the Mamaroo.
customer_reviews.author: OregonGrown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: While the vibration strength is pretty subtle, this bouncer beats out the multiple other bouncers our family has spent $$ on. For the price, this bouncer offer comfortability and affordability in an easy to assemble and transport design. In addition, the material seems to breath better than most allowing for baby to not become super sweaty while kicking and bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Best bouncer for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My son has used 3 different bouncers, and this is by far his favorite. The middle toy has a mirror that he can ser himself in, which makes all babies happy! All he has to do is lightly hit a toy on the tot bar and it spins. He is able to learn cause and effect from this at a very young age. He was frustrated with the other bouncers that allowed him to grab toys, but could not put in his mouth. Also, the bouncer is sturdy, yet allows my son to bounce quite a bit. He is actually excited for me to put him in the bouncer, which is a bonus for me!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Great for Containing Baby Anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer. My son is almost six months old and I’ve been using it since day one. I usually keep it in the bathroom. Weird spot, but it’s great to have something to keep him in while I use the bathroom and shower. I can easily pick it up and move it to other rooms too when I just need to get stuff done.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase a second bouncer so I wanted to look for something inexpensive that will do the job. This is it. It is a simple bouncer chair, but it works great for the 30 or so minutes that my baby uses it each day. It seems comfortable. It does lean up a little far for a really young baby though. And my two month old baby (who is pretty big in weight and length) will very soon outgrow it. But for a smaller baby, it should work for a longer length of time, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: proamazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Baby loves it, especially the vibrations. And it's actually really good on battery life. Only complaint is the "handle" is not a handle. If you happen to read the manual or see the warning tags, it specifically says it's a toy bar and to never lift child in bouncer by it. I'm not sure what the right answer is, but it looks like too much of a handle for it to be that dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a good value. Not as plush as others you see in the store but those are more expensive. I was looking for something to keep my daughter in when I need to get things done around the house while she is awake. The base is sturdy and does not move/slide. I do not like to keep the toy bar on as it is difficult to get the baby in and out of the bouncer with it on. She is still pretty young (2 months) and is not that interested in them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Its very light, and its cute.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is only 3 weeks old. She is still too little to be on it. It is a good size. On the floor while I am in the kitchen cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi and Vic

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for first time parents!
customer_reviews.text: I got this from a friend years ago when I had my first baby, it was not on my registry, but it was the best, so I bought one for my new nephew. My sister in law said they use it everyday and love how portable it is in comparison to a swing. Perfect affordable gift to give to any new parent!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Wished it had a better vibrator.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bouncy chair. It was easy to assemble and I like the bright colors. I bought it after the motor on my existing bouncy chair broke (another brand). My baby seems to enjoy sitting in it and looking at the mirror and toys, but after about 15 minutes he starts to fuss. I think it would be more enjoyable if it had a stronger vibrate feature, it seems to be very weak even with brand new batteries. I would still buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: NurseK

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: The nephew loves this thing. It's a life saver. He loves to bounce and bounce and takes long naps in this bouncer. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive bouncer. The battery powered vibration isnt the best but the nephew doesnt really care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for our twin boys and we use it every day. They love it and so do we. It was so easy to put together. I would by this again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bouncy seat, I really nice the design of it. My only issue is that my 12 week old can’t reach the toys yet as they don’t hang down far enough, so there is nothing to entertain him yet. But it works great as a chair for now and is pretty sturdy (my 4 year old son leans on it a lot when giving his little brother hugs and kisses).
customer_reviews.author: A.S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for rocking, watch out for the music box...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is identical to the one my daughter's child care facility uses. I had to take the musical part off immediately as when my daughter kicks her feet, her heel hits down on the musical box pretty hard. That explained why the day care had removed it from the ones at their site (they have 6 or 7). I can't see any babies not kicking down on the music box. Without the music, the bouncer should have been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H.

customer_reviews.title: My reflux baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this. She has reflux so we sit her up in this after feeds. The toy bar entertains her enough to get her tired within 30 mins and down easy for a nap. We don’t even use the vibrating function. It bounces so easily every moment she makes causes it to bounce enough for her. Good quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Gianna b

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! My 4 month old sits in it and hits the little animals, he likes that it vibrates too. It is very convenient and light, we carry it with us when we go to our friends/family for dinner so that the baby can still sit with us near the table but be comfy and have something to do. Great price for how much we actually use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is great for newborns and parents. Babies who don't care to lay flat will love this product and I love it because I can actually take my baby around the house and get things done. Its lightweight and easy to move from place to place. My baby seems quite comfortable in it especially with the subtle vibration turned on. Naps are frequent. The color isn't too bad either. Looks kind of retro.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Small

customer_reviews.title: This Baby Bouncer is a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Baby is 4 months and learning how fun a bouncer can be. I like that it doesn't play nature sounds or lullabies, there are no batteries because it runs on baby-power, and it folds flat by removing one piece which is great for travel. I've bought 3 of them this spring. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a broken item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item new and it was opened and broken upon arrival. Extremely disappointed with the packaging, however after gluing some of the pieces back together and assembling, it seems it serves its purpose. Changing my 1 Star rating to 3 purely because my child seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great calmer
customer_reviews.text: I finally got one. Normally I use a swing which my daughter loves, but way to big to have in the bedroom. Which leads us to this item. The bouncer works great , my daughter seems to like. She has yet to cry in it which is a great thing. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it can’t be folded and but away easily. I have to take apart the whole thing and put it away
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the one I had before. Good price, light weight and easy to move around. Baby slides to the side which is kind of annoying and he doesn’t like it for too long but it keeps him occupied for a little bit and that helps. He mostly wants to be held anyways. The toy bar is cute and he loves batting the toys.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Need to get things done around the house with a baby? This chair is a life saver! So light and easy to take with you. It’s small enough to take in the car when you are traveling and need something other than car seat to keep baby in when you are at your destination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the cost. I bought this chair as backup for my nephew when I’m babysitting or he’s visiting. He seems happy with it and entertained with the bar. If I was buying one for daily use I would buy a different one, as the quality just isn’t quite the same. But it is good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer it is such a big help w the baby because no matter where I am I can just put it in front of me while I work and have baby sit in and talk to him. The bouncer is also very easy to wash and easy to carry. Sometimes I will take it in my backyard and let baby sit in it, he really enjoys this bouncer and the price is great so is the quality! Also easy to take with you on road trips!
customer_reviews.author: Rehan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this! So glad we invested in this. It is durable. It was relatively easy to clean. I had to take off the sling a few times to wash. The only thing that I didn't like was the mirror on the toy bar because it always reflected light into my baby's eyes. But I fixed it by taping a photo or mama and grandma up there for my baby too look at. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Banana

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it. I suggest also buying batteries
customer_reviews.text: This was a HUGE lifesaver. Our son refused to sleep anywhere besides in our arms when he was born. We bought this as a last resort and it worked amazingly. We have the 4moms swing that costs over $200 and our son prefers this right now. I highly recommend it. I suggest also buying batteries. If you keep the vibration on for long periods of time you'll wearout the battery within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the vibrate box!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chair without the vibrate feature. We used the vibrate feature at first and the friction caused a bleeding ulcer on my baby's heel. The blood was easy to clean out of the fabric, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive must have
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck. Bought it for our house, but daughter ended up taking it home for the grandchild. We had something very similar for the kids when they were small. Good build quality, and easy to use. Don't like that the battery required is a "C". Who uses "C" batteries anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Knut 2650

customer_reviews.title: Love this bouncer baby seat!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and brightly colored bouncer chair for baby. I was very satisfied with this seat for my infant grandson and highly recommend it to others. It’s very durable and still looked new when he outgrew it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie White

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bouncer arrived on time and intact. Daughter likes it until she’s done to be in it. It has 1 vibration setting. You just flip the switch over. The bar is stable and we put other toys on it for her to play with. Would recommend this bouncer if you are looking for a simple one. We don’t need a fancy one with 10 vibration settings and songs though.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, baby comfortable, & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 month old loves this! It’s easy to clean, easy to put together, and the baby loves it. It’s light and simple to move anywhere around the house. He’s now 3 months and the chair is perfect for him to hang out in while I wash dishes, do laundry or get things done around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I really shopped around for this. There were much more expensive seats but this one works great, holds the baby solidly, is easy to move around. There is no need to get anything more. When the baby gets too big for this, he'll move on to something else so he won't be in this for very long but it is so helpful to be able to put him in it, knowing he's secure and I can do something else with my hands besides hold him (although that's no so bad either, just hard to do when I'm washing dishes.) It also makes it easy to talk to him as I go about my routine.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferD

customer_reviews.title: Mirror thing comes off too easy
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Dislike that the part that has the mirror is spin toy comes off so easy instead of clicking in. I’ve dropped it a couple times because it just doesn’t stay on. Also felt like my baby leaned to one side due to not getting the fabric to sent. Paid $17 seems the price went up on this
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take with us on vacation. We flew to our destination and the home we rented had nothing. The baby was 8 weeks at the time and we needed something to put him in. This item came apart very easily and fit into our check baggage no problem. I think I would use something more advanced at home but for travel this item exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Seat
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 6 weeks and his head still flops forward and to the side when he is in this, looking like it blocks his airway. He still seems content in it, but I have to closely monitor him. I am hoping the seat position is a little better once he has better head and neck control. Also, it takes c batteries, which are not exactly something I have lying around the house. One extra step of going to get the right batteries can seem like a lot with a newborn!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren and Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: We have used this now for 7 months and it has been awesome. Totally worth the money and such a big help when you are by yourself trying to clean or shower or what-have you with needing the baby there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Langley

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one in our family. Baby loves it. We (two moms and a grandma) all have one cuz it is light weight, easy to move from room to room and keeps babies entertained. used from one month to crawling age
customer_reviews.author: Drs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. I bought this for when my best friend comes to visit with her new baby. He has only used it once but it works exactly as described. Super quick to put together and good price. It does require a C battery that's not included and that's not a size we keep on hand, other than that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: TINA N TRAVIS

customer_reviews.title: good at bouncing but poor quality seat cover
customer_reviews.text: this bouncer chair is very easy to assemble, the chair is very light. the thing we dont like about it is the seat cover tends to flex towards the right. meaning when my son sits on it, theres a dip on the left (its uneven) and due to that, he does not look very comfortable. I would not purchase this again, and this bouncer chair is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lounger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lounger for my almost 3 month old nephew and he loves it. It's definitely given us a break from holding him all of the time. We removed the toy bar because it was blocking his view and he's very alert and likes to look at everything and everybody. We'll put the toy bar on the lounger when he begins to figure out how the hand eye coordination. He's not quite there yet.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great little bouncer
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and has a removable "toy bar." We use this every night while eating dinner so our now 5-week old can sit at (on) the table with us while we eat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Knollhuff

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy chair fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby granddaughter, and told my daughter that it would be one of the best gifts she got. I was right! Baby uses it all the time, it is sturdy and easy to move around the house to whatever room you are in, baby is 6 months old now and has a great time kicking her feet and making it bounce, reaching for the toys and making them spin. The one thing I loved for my kids 30 yrs ago and was so happy to see they were still being made.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer was so easy to assemble, my eight year old assembled it for me. The pattern is super cute and I love that it is gender neutral. The cover comes off easily for cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Holly51

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this bouncer. He loves to look at the polka dots and lion and he's comfortable in it. My only complaint Is that the vibrating peice keeps falling off and the toy bar is a weird height.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 4 months and he loves his bouncer. The vibration isn’t much at all, I wish it was stronger but it’s still a good product that I can put him in his little chair and get stuff done.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee B

customer_reviews.title: Super good product, easy to clean and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it, he can sit there for a while and play and be everywhere with me in the house. It's easy to take off and machine washable, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tere

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my newborn. He is currently 6 weeks when I ordered this for him but I should have purchased this item sooner. He loves the bright colors and there is a mirror in front that he finds fascinating and it comes with music feature! I am able to do my daily house chores while he sits on this bouncer. It doesn't tilt or rock so I know that he is safe. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: eureka cabilulna

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it needs to do for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price. It’s the perfect size I have my son in the office with me working part time. It fits under the desk to store away. He loves his time in his chair! He was unsure about the vibration at first but now he sits out in it people watching and falls asleep. The top bar provides hours of entertainment. The best $20 I’ve spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Roush

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive bouncer! My husband and I bought 2, one for each of the grandparents’ homes so we didn’t have to keep bringing our bouncer over. It was incredibly easy to set up (maybe 4 minutes) and our little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs help
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to assemble, clean and move. However, the chair material is NOT straight. We couldn’t figure out why our kid was leaning so much to the right when sitting. Well the material is very crooked!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install bought for my mom when my son visits. It bounces but you have to continue to help it move kind of tedious but it’s cheap and light.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great way to let baby entertain himself without doing the work for him
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 week old loves this thing. He kicks his legs back and forth and it bounces like crazy. He was happy in it for 30+ minutes while we cooked and ate dinner. Until now we’ve had to eat in shifts. Wish we’d bought sooner! Some assembly required (easily snapped together) plus requires a C battery for the soothing vibration but we may never use that, he’s happy without it.
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bouncer with vibration
customer_reviews.text: My new little one loves this bouncer. We didnt originally buy a bouncer cause my 3yo loved his swing when he was a baby but my new son prefers the bouncing effect. This one bounces great and has vibration as well
customer_reviews.author: Zara S

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  We have free hands occasionally again!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 month old daughter loves this! She loves looking st the animals that hang over it and is really happy in it. Great to give mom and dad an occasional free hang too! We tried a similar product (R&P) and our daughter would not tolerate it so we were so happy this worked for us!
customer_reviews.author: Joshy B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Busy Mama's!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, inexpensive bouncer for my daughter. It's neutral enough for girl or boy, which helps if it's a surprise gender, or plan on having more kids. It's sturdy. The you part does not click in, kinda weird but I don't use it anyways. My baby has a brother to stare at, lol. I plan on buying one more for the grandparents house.
customer_reviews.author: Aleisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: So so baby seat
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price on this but the play bar isn't very exciting for babies (the mirror is in the wrong spot for them to see). The vibrations also weren't very strong. We consistently would leave it on when we took her out (accidentally of course) so it drained the batteries quickly. Works as a place to put your baby when you need to get something done but not as well as a swing (we ended up buying a swing too and she loves it). My baby is a happy baby. I don't think it would be sufficient for a colic-y baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wegner

product_meta.title: Bright Starts Playful Pinwheels Bouncer with Vibrating Seat
product_meta.description: Color:RedEveryone needs their own happy place. This infant bouncer is made just for your little one: a babies only hangout where the only ticket to entry is adorableness. Spin up sweet moments with the colorful pinwheel design, and keep baby calm with smooth vibrations. One happy baby A toy bar hangs above your baby with cheerful toys that spin and spin. When you are ready to scoop up your baby, the toy bar easily removes. With a lightweight and portable design, baby’s happy place can be with you.
feature_bullets: Spin up sweet moments with a bouncer
Delightfully spinnable toys catch a giggle
Bouncer for baby boy or girl

specifications.material_composition: Bouncer for baby boy or girl
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,169 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
